Text: I thought I should say my uplink is 128k at the moment, but I'll be upgraded to 1000k later this week, so don't lose heart if the transfer rates are shocking to start with.
Well not unexpected, but tragic non the less.

We love you Steve Irwin the true Croc Hunter!

Can someone try to post all his stuff?  Or know a place to get it?

:'-(
Steve Irwin was always a very entertaining and educational person to watch. RIP Steve.
